Clear.name: Clear Command
Clear.description: Clears a specified number of messages from the channel. Because of discord limitations max numbers of messages can be deleted in bunch is 99.

Ping.name: Ping Command
Ping.description: Command used to check bot's response time.

Meme.name: Meme Command
Meme.description: Shows a random meme from the reddit. If the category is mentioned then show a meme from that specific category.

About.name: About Command
About.description: Show's the basic info of the the bot.

Avatar.name: Avatar Command
Avatar.description: Show user profile photo in embed message.

Joke.name: Joke Command
Joke.description: Get a random joke or from the choosen category.

Help.name: Help Command
Help.description: Get info on all the available commands.

Urban.name: Urban Command
Urban.description: Look up a definition for a term in urban dictionary.

Warn.name: Warn Command
Warn.description: Warns someone through DM if they do something.

Wiki.name: Wiki Command
Wiki.description: Get more info from wikipedia on you favourite topic.

Flip.name: Flip Command
Flip.description: Flip a coin to get head or tail.

Roll.name: Dice Roll Command
Roll.description: Rolls a dice with specified dice. Default is 6.

Image.name: Image Command
Image.description: Put various filters on profile photos.

Gemini.name: Gemini Command
Gemini.description: Get AI responses from google gemini.
